#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

class triple{
    public:
        float time;
        int inter;////which interval
        int type;////start time or end time
};

bool f(triple a,triple b){
    if(a.time<b.time){return true;}
    else{return false;}
}

int main() {
    int te;
    cin>>te;
    for(int asd=0;asd<te;asd++){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        vector<triple>v;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            triple x;
            cin>>x.time;
            x.time+=0.01;
            x.inter=i;
            x.type=0;
            v.push_back(x);
        }

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            triple x;
            cin>>x.time;
            x.time-=0.01;
            x.inter=i;
            x.type=1;
            v.push_back(x);
        }

        sort(v.begin(),v.end(),f);
        int curr=0,ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<2*n;i++){
            if(v[i].type==0){
            curr++;
            }else{
                curr--;
            }
            if(curr>ans){ans=curr;}
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
